title: Update Muscle Mass value text color to match Body Fat % styling

requirements.text: Update the Muscle Mass estimation value text color in the Body Analysis results display (frontend/src/pages/BodyAnalysisPage.tsx) to match the styling used for the Body Fat % and Confidence values, ensuring consistent and readable text color across all result metrics

quotes: Muscle Mass text color is bad, its not readable
its the value of Muscle Mass, the text is too dark
it could use the same color as Confidence or Body Fat

acceptanceCriteria: The Muscle Mass value text color matches the text color used for Body Fat % value
The Muscle Mass value text color matches the text color used for Confidence value
The Muscle Mass value text is clearly readable against its background
All three result values (Body Fat %, Confidence, Muscle Mass) have consistent text styling

constraints: Only modify the text color styling for the Muscle Mass value, not the label or other elements
Do not change the layout or positioning of the Muscle Mass display
Maintain consistency with existing Body Fat % and Confidence text color patterns
nonGoals: Changing the Muscle Mass label styling
Modifying the background colors or card layout
Updating other text elements on the Body Analysis page
Changing the backend muscle mass calculation logic
